attributes.additional_details: I as an ex veteran of the Northern Ireland conflict, I find his remarks in that the IRA terrorists should be praised for there contribution in bring the peace process into force with the sacrifices they made, naming Bobby Sands as one who should be praised, after serving in 4 tours and loosing some friends, not only in Northern Ireland, but also in England through PIRA activities, I feel that this MP should be dishonourably  dismissed without any pay or compensation, and a public apology to the veterans of this Country by the Government

rejection.details: This is a matter for the Political party and not for HMG
